name: Be the Indie Wrestler
description:
In Be the Indie Wrestler,  you can finally experience the thrill of wrestling in an Elk's Lodge in front of 12 people from the comfort of your own home. This text-based, choose your own adventure game takes you through a whole night as a performer on a bad independent professional wrestling show. Will you plan your match or wing it? Will you survive the bizarre social interactions?  And will you even get paid? 

Written by former professional wrestler Chris "Rob Matter" Hutton

TWITTER: @TopherDisgrace

WEBSITE: chrishutton.carrd.co
